pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo ekaṃ vassaṃ dve vuṭṭhāpenti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:1.5: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo ekaṃ vassaṃ dve vuṭṭhāpessanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:1.7: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:1.8: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:1.9: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo ekaṃ vassaṃ dve vuṭṭhāpessantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:1.10: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo ekaṃ vassaṃ dve vuṭṭhāpentī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:1.13: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo ekaṃ vassaṃ dve vuṭṭhāpessanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:1.15: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:1.16: “Yā pana bhikkhunī ekaṃ vassaṃ dve vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:2.1.9: “Dve vuṭṭhāpessāmī”ti gaṇaṃ vā ācariniṃ vā pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā pariyesati, sīmaṃ vā sammannati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:2.1.13: Gaṇassa ca ācariniyā ca āpatti dukkaṭassa.
